notes: Drava River microplastic monitoring campaign. Focus on seasonal variations and pollution source identification.
title: Drava River Microplastic Survey
description: Comprehensive study of microplastic distribution in Drava River, focusing on seasonal variations and pollution sources.

notes: Po River Delta microlitter analysis. Systematic collection using specialized filtration systems.
title: Po River Delta Microlitter Study
description: Systematic collection and analysis of microlitter in Po River Delta using specialized filtration systems.

notes: Douro Estuary microplastic assessment. Focus on estuarine dynamics and pollution transport.
title: Douro Estuary Microplastic Assessment
description: Assessment of microplastic distribution and transport in the Douro River estuary.

notes: Danube River microplastic monitoring in Vienna reach. Urban pollution impact assessment.
title: Danube River Vienna Urban Assessment
description: Monitoring of microplastic pollution in Danube River near Vienna, assessing urban impact.
